intro: Step into the swarm and rise as the ultimate survivor!
description:
Armed with powerful weapons, blast through waves of fierce enemies to reach the ultimate boss. Collect upgrades along the way to power up and make every shot count!

Unleash a diverse arsenal – from classic firearms to devastating rocket launchers – each with unique abilities for unstoppable action. Gear up with special outfits, each boosting your strength and making every battle more dynamic.

Features:
- Navigate through various landscapes
- Defend yourself from the fierce invaders
- Pick up upgrades to get stronger
- Level up and buy awesome talents
- Complete quests for useful loot
- Open epic loot boxes and enhance your gear

Dodge, shoot, and strategize your moves. Are you ready to conquer the swarm?
